20110119023136.000|20110119023137.000|CC1|THE INVESTIGATION HE SHOULD NOT 
20110119023137.000|20110119023138.000|CC1|LEAVE THE COUNTRY.

20110119023542.000|20110119023544.000|CC1|TOLD US HE'LL STAY ON THE

20110119023552.000|20110119023553.000|CC1|HERE.                           
20110119023553.000|20110119023555.000|CC1|BUT WHAT'S HAPPENING HERE IN    
20110119023555.000|20110119023558.000|CC1|TUNISIA IS SENDING SHOCK WAVES  
20110119023558.000|20110119023600.000|CC1|ACROSS THE ARAB WORLD, FROM     
20110119023600.000|20110119023605.000|CC1|NORTH AFRICA, TO THE ARABIAN    
20110119023605.000|20110119023606.000|CC1|PENINSULA, THERE'S NOW TALK OF  
20110119023606.000|20110119023608.000|CC1|SPREADING THE TUNISIAN MODEL.   
20110119023608.000|20110119023609.000|CC1|TWO PEOPLE TRIED TO BURN        
20110119023609.000|20110119023610.000|CC1|THEMSELVES TO DEATH TO COPY A   
20110119023610.000|20110119023611.000|CC1|TUNISIAN SUICIDE LAST MONTH THAT
20110119023611.000|20110119023614.000|CC1|TRIGGERED THE DEMONSTRATION.

20110119025229.000|20110119025229.000|CC1|   [ Woman ] I HAD THIS DEEP,   
20110119025229.000|20110119025231.000|CC1|  RADIATING PAIN EVERYWHERE...  
20110119025231.000|20110119025233.000|CC1|   AND I WONDERED WHAT IT WAS.  
20110119025233.000|20110119025233.000|CC1|   I FOUND OUT THAT CONNECTED   
20110119025233.000|20110119025236.000|CC1|   TO OUR MUSCLES ARE NERVES    
20110119025236.000|20110119025236.000|CC1|       THAT SEND MESSAGES       
20110119025236.000|20110119025237.000|CC1|       THROUGH THE BODY.        
20110119025237.000|20110119025237.000|CC1|     MY DOCTOR DIAGNOSED IT     
20110119025237.000|20110119025240.000|CC1|        AS FIBROMYALGIA,        
20110119025240.000|20110119025240.000|CC1|    THOUGHT TO BE THE RESULT    
20110119025240.000|20110119025242.000|CC1|      OF OVERACTIVE NERVES      
20110119025242.000|20110119025242.000|CC1|       THAT CAUSE CHRONIC,

20110119025249.000|20110119025249.000|CC1|       SIGNIFICANT RELIEF       
20110119025249.000|20110119025251.000|CC1|     FROM FIBROMYALGIA PAIN.    
20110119025251.000|20110119025251.000|CC1|  AND LESS PAIN MEANS I CAN DO  
20110119025251.000|20110119025254.000|CC1|   MORE WITH THE ONES I LOVE.   
20110119025254.000|20110119025254.000|CC1|       [ Female Announcer ]     
20110119025254.000|20110119025256.000|CC1|   LYRICA IS NOT FOR EVERYONE.  
20110119025256.000|20110119025256.000|CC1|         LYRICA MAY CAUSE       
20110119025256.000|20110119025259.000|CC1|    SERIOUS ALLERGIC REACTIONS

20110119025308.000|20110119025308.000|CC1|     OR CHANGES IN EYESIGHT,

20110119025315.000|20110119025315.000|CC1|     WEIGHT GAIN AND SWELLING

20110119025354.000|20110119025356.000|CC1|GREATEST GENERATION.

20110119025358.000|20110119025400.000|CC1|THE FOUNDING HEAD OF THE PEACE  
20110119025400.000|20110119025401.000|CC1|CORPS AND FOR SO MUCH MORE

20110119025409.000|20110119025410.000|CC1|MARIA SHRIVER, OF COURSE, A
